name: Minerals Technologies Inc.
description: Minerals Technologies Inc. (MTX) is a global leader in specialty minerals and synthetic mineral products. Founded in 1992, the company focuses on providing innovative solutions to a wide range of industries, including paper, plastics, construction, and personal care. MTX operates through several business segments, including Performance Materials, which produces talc and other functional additives; Specialty Minerals, which supplies high-performance products used in various applications; and Refractories, which provides advanced materials for the steel and non-ferrous industries. The company is committed to sustainable practices, leveraging its expertise in mineral science to develop eco-friendly products that meet the evolving needs of its customers. Minerals Technologies is known for its proprietary technologies, such as the use of innovative processing techniques and advanced formulations that enhance product performance. With an extensive global presence, MTX serves customers in over 80 countries, ensuring reliable supply and exceptional service. The company’s dedication to quality and sustainability positions it as a trusted partner across diverse markets, continually driving innovation and operational excellence to meet customer demands.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
